desc: An online lifestyle boutique, featuring beautiful handmade brass jewelry that are Lightweight, Nickel Free & will Non-Tarnish. Putting people & planet first! We aim at breaking the cycle of generational poverty, so we source our products directly from artisan & all the while creating access to Global Market.

layout.text:
Welcome to our Beautiful Brass Jewelry from India Collection, each piece crafted by artisans in Western India.
Nickel Free | Lightweight | Non-Tarnish Collection
